bill_title: regulate the discharge of firearms from public right-of-way.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to regulate the discharge of firearms from public right-of- way. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 41-9 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No person may discharge a firearm in the course of hunting on any public right-of-way pursuant to § § 41-9-1.1 and 41-9-1.3 unless the person is more than fifty yards from the vehicle in which the person was traveling and unless the vehicle in which the person was traveling has been parked so that the vehicle does not present a traffic hazard, does not obstruct traffic, and the doors of the vehicle are closed. A violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
